title: UCSB - Keio Exchange Program
text:
UCSB - Keio University Exchange Program








Welcome to the official website for the Arts, Science and Technology in Global Leadership Summer 2023 Exchange Program between UC Santa Barbara and Keio University.

title: Program Information
text:
The majority of program events will take place in ELLSN 2626 on the UCSB campus.






The program will begin with an introductory dinner on Monday, September 25, 2023 at the UCSB Club and Guest House, followed by two full days on September 26 and 27, 2023. A full schedule will be provided to participants during Registration and Check-In.

title: Program Information
text:
Program Goals
This page will be updated soon to include overarching program goals.

title: Projects
text: Once the program has concluded, copies of the group presentations will appear on this page.
